verses.verse: And it came to pass in the days <WH3117> of Amraphel <WH569> king <WH4428> of Shinar <WH8152>, Arioch <WH746> king <WH4428> of Ellasar <WH495>, Chedorlaomer <WH3540> king <WH4428> of Elam <WH5867>, and Tidal <WH8413> king <WH4428> of nations <WH1471>;

That these made <WH6213> war <WH4421> with <WH854> Bera <WH1298> king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467>, and with Birsha <WH1306> king <WH4428> of Gomorrah <WH6017>, Shinab <WH8134> king <WH4428> of Admah <WH126>, and Shemeber <WH8038> king <WH4428> of Zeboiim <WH6636>, and the king <WH4428> of Bela <WH1106>, which is <WH1931> Zoar <WH6820>.
All these were joined together <WH2266> in the vale <WH6010> of Siddim <WH7708>, which <WH1931> is the salt <WH4417> sea <WH3220>.
Twelve <WH6240> <WH8147> years <WH8141> they served <WH5647> <WH853> Chedorlaomer <WH3540>, and in the thirteenth <WH7969> <WH6240> year <WH8141> they rebelled <WH4775>.

And in the fourteenth <WH6240> <WH702> year <WH8141> came <WH935> Chedorlaomer <WH3540>, and the kings <WH4428> that were with him, and smote <WH5221> the Rephaims <WH7497> in Ashteroth Karnaim <WH6255>, and the Zuzims <WH2104> in Ham <WH1990>, and the Emims <WH368> in Shaveh Kiriathaim <WH7741>,
And the Horites <WH2752> in their mount <WH2042> Seir <WH8165>, unto El-paran <WH364>, which is by <WH5921> the wilderness <WH4057>.

And they returned <WH7725>, and came <WH935> to <WH413> En-mishpat <WH5880>, which is Kadesh <WH6946>, and smote <WH5221> all the country <WH7704> of the Amalekites <WH6003>, and also the Amorites <WH567>, that dwelt <WH3427> in Hazezon-tamar <WH2688>.

And there went out <WH3318> the king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467>, and the king <WH4428> of Gomorrah <WH6017>, and the king <WH4428> of Admah <WH126>, and the king <WH4428> of Zeboiim <WH6636>, and the king <WH4428> of Bela <WH1106> (the same <WH1931> is Zoar <WH6820>;) and they joined <WH6186> battle <WH4421> with them in the vale <WH6010> of Siddim <WH7708>;

With Chedorlaomer <WH3540> the king <WH4428> of Elam <WH5867>, and with Tidal <WH8413> king <WH4428> of nations <WH1471>, and Amraphel <WH569> king <WH4428> of Shinar <WH8152>, and Arioch <WH746> king <WH4428> of Ellasar <WH495>; four <WH702> kings <WH4428> with five <WH2568>.

And the vale <WH6010> of Siddim <WH7708> was full of <WH875> slimepits <WH875> <WH2564>; and the kings <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah <WH6017> fled <WH5127>, and fell <WH5307> there; and they that remained <WH7604> fled <WH5127> to the mountain <WH2022>.
And they took <WH3947> all the goods <WH7399> of Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah <WH6017>, and all their victuals <WH400>, and went their way <WH3212>.
And they took <WH3947> Lot <WH3876>, Abram's <WH87> brother's <WH251> son <WH1121>, who dwelt <WH3427> in Sodom <WH5467>, and his goods <WH7399>, and departed <WH3212>.

¶ And there came <WH935> one that had escaped <WH6412>, and told <WH5046> Abram <WH87> the Hebrew <WH5680>; for he dwelt <WH7931> in the plain <WH436> of Mamre <WH4471> the Amorite <WH567>, brother <WH251> of Eshcol <WH812>, and brother <WH251> of Aner <WH6063>: and these were confederate <WH1167> <WH1285> with Abram <WH87>.

And when Abram <WH87> heard <WH8085> that his brother <WH251> was taken captive <WH7617>, he armed <WH7324> his trained <WH2593> servants, born <WH3211> in his own house <WH1004>, three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and eighteen <WH6240> <WH8083>, and pursued <WH7291> them unto Dan <WH1835>.

And he divided <WH2505> himself against them, he and his servants <WH5650>, by night <WH3915>, and smote <WH5221> them, and pursued <WH7291> them unto Hobah <WH2327>, which is on the left hand <WH8040> of Damascus <WH1834>.
And he brought back <WH7725> all the goods <WH7399>, and also brought again <WH7725> his brother <WH251> Lot <WH3876>, and his goods <WH7399>, and the women <WH802> also, and the people <WH5971>.

¶ And the king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467> went out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> him after <WH310> his return <WH7725> from the slaughter <WH5221> of Chedorlaomer <WH3540>, and of the kings <WH4428> that were with him, at the valley <WH6010> of Shaveh <WH7740>, which <WH1931> is the king's <WH4428> dale <WH6010>.
And Melchizedek <WH4442> king <WH4428> of Salem <WH8004> brought forth <WH3318> bread <WH3899> and wine <WH3196>: and he was the priest <WH3548> of the most high <WH5945> God <WH410>.
And he blessed <WH1288> him, and said <WH559>, Blessed <WH1288> be Abram <WH87> of the most high <WH5945> God <WH410>, possessor <WH7069> of heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>:
And blessed <WH1288> be the most high <WH5945> God <WH410>, which hath delivered <WH4042> thine enemies <WH6862> into thy hand <WH3027>. And he gave <WH5414> him tithes <WH4643> of all.
And the king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467> said <WH559> unto Abram <WH87>, Give <WH5414> me the persons <WH5315>, and take <WH3947> the goods <WH7399> to thyself.

And Abram <WH87> said <WH559> to the king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467>, I have lift up <WH7311> mine hand <WH3027> unto the LORD <WH3068>, the most high <WH5945> God <WH410>, the possessor <WH7069> of heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>,

That I will not <WH518> take from a thread <WH2339> even to a shoelatchet <WH5275> <WH8288>, and that I will not <WH518> take <WH3947> any thing that is thine, lest thou shouldest say <WH559>, I have made <WH6238> Abram <WH87> rich <WH6238>:

Save <WH1107> only that which <WH834> the young men <WH5288> have eaten <WH398>, and the portion <WH2506> of the men <WH582> which went <WH1980> with <WH854> me, Aner <WH6063>, Eshcol <WH812>, and Mamre <WH4471>; let them <WH1992> take <WH3947> their portion <WH2506>.
